comment: She is definitely one of the most amazing professors that I've had so far in my college career. She gives online exams. She cares about her students and their success! TAKE HER. you will NOT regret it.  THIS IS A GEORGIA STATE UNIVERSITY RATING. NOT KSU.

Ballard is literally my favorite professor at KSU. She knows what she is talking about and will go above and beyond to help you out. Yes she is a tough grader but if you do what you're suppose to do you will do well in her class. Take her, she's amazing!

First off I want to say that she was my FAVORITE instructor of this entire semester and easily one of the best at KSU. Ballard is super sweet and hilarious! I could easily listen to her all day. She does cares about your grade so it is in your best interest to take her! I thought the class was very informative and fun to be in. She is top notch!

Took her for Criminology and she is hilarious. She does not use class time wisely, the majority of the time is spent discussing random things, so you pretty much have to teach yourself through the readings and discussions. She takes forever to grade things and grades them very difficulty. Do the work and you'll be fine.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Mrs. Ballard is the teacher to have. Not only is she there for you in class she is there for you outside of class. if you have a question about material shoot her a text she will answer it and give you examples. She made research methods so easy and fun. She uses real life situations to break down the material. YOU NEED TO TAKE HER.

TAKE HER! She is amazing. Anyone that says her class is difficult just didn't try hard enough. Go to class, pay attention, work hard,and pick a good group for your project and you will be fine. She is straight forward and hilarious. Honestly, one of the only professors at KSU that has actually taught me and helped me learn. She is simply the best!
She's an amazing teacher and person if your a CJ major take her classes as much as you possibly can.
Amazing professor! She's funny and made class very enjoyable. There are 4 tests - multiple choice and online. Loved her. Would recommend her to anyone

Elle is amazing. She is a research fanatic but respects students and tries to teach the right way in a methods class. You go into the class scared, end up loving her, and tries to help students so much in the class. Grade is made up of HW, Mini Projects, Labs, Attendance, Midterm, and Final. So easy though and Break these up into sections. Easy A!
She is the most amazing teacher I am happy to have taken her class all I seem to talk about is her class

I have never liked a teacher as much as her. Her stories are beyond funny but they mostly tie into what your learning. You really get to know her from what she shares of herself. Her tests are beyond easy too, all online, she knows your gonna use google, but i would show up an take notes, not everything is on google.

Elle is HILARIOUS! You will enjoy her class without a doubt. Most people struggle with this subject but she makes it fun and easy. Just expect to do work and show up to class and you will do great. Get the audible version of damned lies and statistics for the paper at the end of the semester.
She's awesome. Attendance isn't mandatory but this is a class i actually enjoy going to. All of the tests are online.
Definitely my favorite professor so far! She's awesome and hilarious.

She was an awesome professor. Made the class interesting. I looked forward to class. Did not assign a text book, all of the readings were posted online. She has to be one of the most down to earth and caring people around.

This was a very easy class. Attendance is important, but the class is enjoyable. Take notes, you'll need them for your upper level CRJU classes if this is your major. I think she prepared me for my major better than anyone could. Also, she could probably be a stand up comic with her talent at dry humor. Online tests and extra credit.
Tests were easy, she's very cooperative, outgoing teaching style makes for fun environment, take even if you're not interested in Criminal Justice!
This woman was AWESOME! I'm sad she's leaving though.

Attendance is part of your grade. She makes lectures interesting. She's pretty. Her tests were online & easy. We didn't use the book at all. She is liberal in some ways, conservative in others. The first day, she says things like she'll fail you if she catches you texting, but she's actually really sweet. I got an A. Extra credit is offered.

She is AWESOME! If you have a chance to take a class with her, do it. I'm not even a criminal justice major, but she now has me interested in the system. She's nice, helpful, and cares about you actually learning the material. You don't need the book. Just about everything is from lecture. Attend class! You'll enjoy it!

Asks for an obituary to excuse a deceased relative absence, otherwise nothing counts as excused.  Locks door after first 10 minutes and will NOT let you in.  Takes attendance at the END of class every time. Very snarky, these comments must be the creepers in the class because she is NOT wonderful and sweet!!!!

BEST TEACHER EVER! I love Elle! She is an easy teacher and is always willing to help. There are a ton of opportunities for extra credit and she is hilarious. The class is actually fun to go to and not boring. TAKE ELLE!!! I wish she taught every course at KSU.
Elle is awesome!! She is crystal clear when she speaks and tells you exactly what to study for.. can't wait to take her for other CJ courses.
So HOT!! Keeps your attention!  Knows the subject matter too! haha
Good at kissing very nice always helped me after class
She gives many extra credit options as well as different options for the midterm and final. Very interesting class!

I love Elle! She's been my favorite professor all semester. Not only is her class easy, interesting, and you learn so much but she's sooo helpful. Not just for class but also outside of class too. She's been awesome with grad school info. Take her you'll love her there's no way to fail unless you want to fail.
She is awesome. She is straight forward and her test are straight from the notes. she makes you really want to come to class!!

Hands down an amazing person/professor. Extremely interested in helping students & making sure they do well. Very straight up & honest as well as down to earth. Really relates to her students & teaches what will be useful after college instead of just crap. Enjoyed classes & lectures were rarely boring.
Great teacher

ELLI is the bomb!! Awesome professor, very knowledgeable, engaging, and readily available for questions/concerns. Goes out of her way to encourage students and make sure that the material is properly absorbed and comprehended by her students. You WILL leave that class with a better understanding of the subject matter. worth the money ;-)

YOU HAVE TO TAKE ELLE FOR SENIOR SEMINAR!!! THIS WOMAN IS AMAZING!! Always has time for her students and goes the extra mile to help in anyway she can.  Attendence is not mandatory but you wouldn't wan to miss her class.  Do the work and you will get an 'A'. The best professor at KSU PERIOD!!!! NUFF SAID!!!!

This is simply the best porfessor to have at KSU! You will have so much fun in her class. Shes Hott, funny, and always has time to help.  Come to class do your work and you will get an 'A'! Shes KSU's best kept secret!

She commands that desks be in a circle as if it's around a campfire, curses, and will throw you out of class if not prepared.She states this is a senior level class, and expects Senior level effort.She may be right, but I expect Senior level teaching.If you like that feeling of being in 6th grade and treated like a kid, she's the prof for you.

GREAT professor. I won't say the class is easy because even though I made an A, I had to study hard. If you go to class, pay attention, take notes, and study for tests, then you should be able to get an A without a problem. Ballard is really nice and funny and makes class interesting. I definitely recommend!

I just want to say that this professor was a great teacher. She is interesting, knowledgable, and caring. Her tests are not hard as long as you study for them. She always includes extra credit questions. There are interesting class discussions and guest speakers. She always has a crazy story to go along with what is being taught.

Professor Ballard is perhaps the nicest, sweetest teacher I've had at KSU. Not only that but the class was very fun and interesting. We had guest speakers, we watched relevant videos and movies, and we had awesome class discussions. She also takes an interest in what she is teaching and you can tell. I want to take more classes with her!
I Love her! very easy class, she gives a lot of extra credits! no paper! I excempt the finals, she's good! I will recommend her, she gives review notes for the test.
OMG!! She is soo nice, and when you need the help, she is 100% there for you!
Not an easier class out there. Great teachers who likes to joke around and have a good time. Definitely take this class!
She is awesome!.easy A! take her class and you wont regret it. I love this teacher!

You can't get any easier than this. I never even looked at the book, all the notes are on WebCT. I made an A on all the tests. Guest speakers and videos are interesting. Definitely take this if you are interested in CJ. Fun class
I wish she taught more, I would take her for every class

She ROCKS! This is the kind of teacher I wish I had for every class-fun, makes class very interesting and really wants her students to do well. She knows how to make even the driest material funny so that you remember it. Gives extra credit opportunities. Tests are very clear and fair. She's terrific!

This teacher is awesome. It's an easy A if you go to class and attempt to learn the material. This class is pretty straight forward so you have to try and she will help you succeed. I recommend this teacher if you want to understand the material for future uses.
Elle is a sweet lady.  The class is just the basics and she lays it all out in power points.  Very easy and interesting at times.  You'll enjoy her class!
Really nice woman, very pretty too... I enjoyed the class Mrs. Ballard always made an attempt to make class fun. Very enjoyable class and teacher.

She is a great professor.  She made the class easier, but she didn't just powerpoint the book, she added to it.  It was a fun class, and I loved the teaching style.  She's extremely helpful and I wish she taught something else.
She is really cool, and it's an easy class. You will enjoy this professor and class if your interested in criminal justice at all.

Very EASY.... you can get like 10 points extra credit. Reads powerpoints and you get extra credit for attendence. Her husband is a fed agent and he came in and talked to us. Very understanding teacher, likes to make the class fun!!

It was easy. All of the powerpoints were online, although she gives extra credit for attendance sometimes. She's very flexible and understanding if you work/have issues to deal with. Kind of annoying sometimes. She's new and you can tell, she's not very knowledgable on the subject, but if you're just looking for a grade, I'd say take Ballard.

She's awesome! :) great teacher--flexible and willing to work with you. she's new to teaching, but she's easy to understnad. reads straight from the power points and has a study guide for each test with the exact info on the test. tests are pretty easy for the most part. all multiple choice and she gives extra credit once in a while! :)
